CN_or: There are many disabled people who are not a burden.  There are also many disabled people who are just struggling to live with the burden of their disability.

HS_ed: The disabled are a burden to society.
CN_ed: They are not, they just need a place to live without discrimination and a bit of attention.
HS_or: The disabled are a burden to society
CN_or: They are not, they just need a place to sleep and a bit of attention.

HS_ed: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
CN_ed: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is an evidence that what you say is false.
HS_or: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
CN_or: The fact that some disabled people can work is evidence that the situation is improving.  The 'burden' on the society is on the owner of the property, not the person with a disability.

HS_ed: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
CN_ed: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.
HS_or: Gays are just sick. They should be isolated.
CN_or: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

HS_ed: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
CN_ed: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!
HS_or: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
CN_or: What is wrong with a person being attracted to people of other religions or cultures? That is what the Bible is all about!

HS_ed: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
CN_ed: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide or try to be inclusive instead?
HS_or: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about the Jews.
CN_or: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with millions of refugees or have the same as Germany?

HS_ed: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
CN_ed: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.
HS_or: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
CN_or: The murder of Jews is unacceptable. How about the extermination of the European-Asiatic race?

HS_ed: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
CN_ed: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with the basic human rights.
HS_or: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
CN_or: In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is what makes them 'human': to respect the basic human rights.

HS_ed: To work with Jews and to ignore that they are too different from us is just stupid.
CN_ed: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and  to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with who is different.
HS_or: People who don't like Jews shouldn't accept their contributions.
CN_or: It's not a racist belief to work with people of different faiths, what is racist is not to integrate, but not to acknowledge your differences.

HS_ed: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
CN_ed: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept the same hate to be present in different countries over and over again.
HS_or: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of nationalism and racism.
CN_or: How about we work together to find a solution? We can't accept the same people in power in different countries.

HS_ed: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN_ed: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.
HS_or: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN_or: Jews are part of our society and should be respected, but this does not mean we have to tolerate their intolerance.

HS_ed: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
CN_ed: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.
HS_or: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
CN_or: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to its health by doing their jobs well.

HS_ed: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other evidence that can explain this. The government must keep an eye on Jews. We must not allow them to suppress our society.
CN_ed: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely.
HS_or: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other religion that can explain this. We must keep an eye on the behaviour of the government and the media. We must not allow them to use laws to suppress our religions.
CN_or: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely. And they have the right to their beliefs to practise.

HS_ed: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
CN_ed: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?
HS_or: Jews are racist, they only care about the race.
CN_or: In Britain, we are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being British?

HS_ed: Jews are an inferior race.
CN_ed: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.
HS_or: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race.
CN_or: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can't be proven?

HS_ed: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
CN_ed: Actually it did happen, with an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation. They can still be part of European countries, they just can't be discriminated for their beliefs.
HS_or: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race.
CN_or: Actually it happened a lot, with an estimated 11 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation. But they could still be part of European countries, they just aren't talking about it.

HS_ed: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
CN_ed: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.
HS_or: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element.
CN_or: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their behaviour did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, you can be sure that their attitude towards humanity and tolerance has improved with time.

HS_ed: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
CN_ed: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.
HS_or: This is not about the Jewish community, this is about power.
CN_or: The campaign against the BDS movement is about the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

HS_ed: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
CN_ed: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jews. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.
HS_or: The only people that need immigration are jews.
CN_or: Your statement shows you don't know what's good for jews. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country, if there is a need, we should be there.

HS_ed: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
CN_ed: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.
HS_or: I was raised by a Jew, we are better than this.
CN_or: You can't blame someone else for what they believe in, that is something created by God himself.

HS_ed: Gays are just an abomination to God.
CN_ed: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same sexual orientation.
HS_or: Gays are just an abomination to God.
CN_or: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same religion or culture.

HS_ed: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
CN_ed: I think transgenders should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.
HS_or: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
CN_or: I think transgenders should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just more comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

HS_ed: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
CN_ed: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?
HS_or: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness is homosexuality.
CN_or: This statement is not supported by the scientific evidence, you can't blame the people for their mind. Do you really think that a mental disorder that affects 40% of the population and is not accepted by most would be accepted by most people?

HS_ed: This is not the way I want our society to be. I want it to be composed of people of my gender, not lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex people.
CN_ed: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are so inclusive because they can accept the values of others. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.
HS_or: This is not the way I want to raise our children. I want them raised by someone of my gender, not a lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex person.
CN_or: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are still there is because they can't accept all the culture and values of other. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.

HS_ed: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
CN_ed: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.
HS_or: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
CN_or: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and that's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who suffer from them.

HS_ed: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN_ed: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.
HS_or: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN_or: These are not the words of one person condemning all gay people. They are instead a personal reflection on you. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

HS_ed: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
CN_ed: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?
HS_or: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
CN_or: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society of 500 million people when there are still so many questions left unanswered?

HS_ed: Gays are a burden to society.
CN_ed: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.
HS_or: Gays are a burden to society.
CN_or: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel loved.

HS_ed: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
CN_ed: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.
HS_or: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
CN_or: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead, we should promote the values of a society. For example, love and respect for others.

HS_ed: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is the only right thing to do.
CN_ed: How about we include any community no matter what? We're all part of the same society after all.
HS_or: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is like telling white people they can't be part of a black or brown community.
CN_or: How about we ignore the existence of any community at all? What the heck, we're all affected by the fundamentalist elements in society.

HS_ed: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
CN_ed: Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense and trying to accept who is different instead of bringing back dark pages of Europe's history?
HS_or: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
CN_or: The use of natural gas for heating is used all over the world for purposes other than heating houses. Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense instead?

HS_ed: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
CN_ed: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion and of democracy.
HS_or: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
CN_or: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion.

HS_ed: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
CN_ed: People may be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this, they cannot be considered wrong. The point of being together is to create a stable connection between two people who love each other, regardless of sexual preferences.
HS_or: There is no difference between a gay and a straight marriage! They are both wrong! There is no difference between a gay and a straight relationship! I think you are mistaken about your beliefs.
CN_or: People may choose not to be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this they cannot change. The point of a marriage is to create a stable home for one's children.

HS_ed: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
CN_ed: Gay people may have any sexual preference they want, that's their prerogative as human beings.
HS_or: There is no difference between a gay and a straight marriage! They are both wrong! There is no difference between a gay and a straight relationship! I think you are mistaken about your beliefs.
CN_or: Gay people may have any preference they want, that's their prerogative.

HS_ed: Gays are sick.
CN_ed: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Why do you say so?
HS_or: Gays are sick.
CN_or: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. According to a 2014 survey, most Americans said they supported gay marriage and would not want to see gays "reborn as adults."

HS_ed: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
CN_ed: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.
HS_or: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They should be isolated from the planet!
CN_or: Gay people are not alone in feeling alienated from the wider world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can still experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to "reconstruct" these feelings through same sex relationships.

HS_ed: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN_ed: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. They are most of the time just as attracted to other people as anyone else.
HS_or: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN_or: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. They are most of the time just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

HS_ed: Diversity is the cause of our weakness. Since faggots are different to us, they should be excluded.
CN_ed: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude. Loving someone of their own sex doesn't make them any less human.
HS_or: Diversity is the key to our strength. We cannot be a diverse country.
CN_or: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude.

HS_ed: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
CN_ed: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.
HS_or: The idea of transgender is beyond the pale, and nobody should have to choose between their life and their beliefs.
CN_or: The idea of transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, without discrimination.

HS_ed: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
CN_ed: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their sexual orientation, it would be impossible to have a democracy.
HS_or: What if we didn't go to the polls and let people vote illegally?
CN_or: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their name, this would be impossible.

HS_ed: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
CN_ed: Our democracy guarantees this right for anyone regardless of sexual orientation, so we should allow the people to decide for themselves whether to take part in the democratic process.
HS_or: What if we didn't go to the polls and let people vote illegally?
CN_or: The ruling class blocked this right for themselves, so we should allow the people to decide for themselves whether to take part in the democratic process.

HS_ed: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays around them. They are a problem.
CN_ed: I don't know about you, but we already live in a society where everyone is free to love who they prefer, and I don't see any reason why your kids would be damaged by this.
HS_or: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays in them. They are a problem.
CN_or: I don't know about you, but I don't see any reason why your kids would be any different from anyone else's.

HS_ed: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
CN_ed: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?
HS_or: I think gay people are a burden to society.
CN_or: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love themselves too?

HS_ed: Gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
CN_ed: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?
HS_or: Gay people are a burden to society.
CN_or: Gay people are loved by everyone, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving themselves?

HS_ed: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN_ed: The fact that gays exist doesn't prove that they are a burden to society. How could it be?
HS_or: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN_or: The fact that gays exist doesn't prove that they are a burden to society.

HS_ed: Immigrants and refugees do not share our religious values.
CN_ed: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem for this reason?
HS_or: Mobs, immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
CN_or: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem?

HS_ed: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN_ed: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human people.
HS_or: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN_or: Why do you say this about people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should explain this to the one who did: he is only a human and not a person.

HS_ed: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN_ed: I would like to see Europe united, not divided by hate towards other nationalities.
HS_or: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN_or: I would like to see Europe united, not divided.

HS_ed: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
CN_ed: The immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as it's best for them.
HS_or: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
CN_or: The immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life.

HS_ed: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
CN_ed: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.
HS_or: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them, our children will suffer!
CN_or: Immigration is good for our economy.

HS_ed: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
CN_ed: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.
HS_or: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. We must get rid of it.
CN_or: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the gender of the victim. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted.

HS_ed: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
CN_ed: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.
HS_or: Please have a look at this well-meaning "call for a tolerant and diverse Scotland" article that encourages people to not only hate immigrants, but also to be 'part of the solution' to tackling racism.
CN_or: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality, religion, place of birth and sexual orientation.

HS_ed: Migrants rape our young people: they must be deported.
CN_ed: If we exclude rape committed by migrants, there still remain rape cases.  How can we say that they are the only ones to do it?
HS_or: migrants rape our young people
CN_or: If we exclude rape committed by migrants, how can we say that they are the only ones to do it?

HS_ed: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
CN_ed: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.
HS_or: migrants rape our young people
CN_or: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes.

HS_ed: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
CN_ed: Most people don't refer to them just as 'migrants', but they provide a negative connotation of that word: that's the problem. Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?
HS_or: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
CN_or: Most people don't refer to them as migrants. They just want to live and work in the UK.

HS_ed: Migrants steal our jobs.
CN_ed: Most migrants are workers who have contributed to our country. To refer to them as thieves just perpetuates division and makes them feel like second class citizens.
HS_or: Migrants steal our jobs.
CN_or: Most migrants in the UK are workers who have contributed to our country. To refer to them as 'migrants' just perpetuates division and makes them feel like second class citizens.

HS_ed: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
CN_ed: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.
HS_or: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
CN_or: Migration is an important part of modern life. The UK is a country of many people, not just one people. To imply that it is somehow 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

HS_ed: Refugee crisis in our country is a burden to our society.
CN_ed: Refugees are not a problem in the EU. We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU and that is beneficial both to our economy and to our society.
HS_or: Refugee crisis in our country is a result of uncontrolled immigration.
CN_or: Refugees are not a problem in the EU. We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU.

HS_ed: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
CN_ed: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.
HS_or: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
CN_or: Some immigrants work legally and provide for our families. We should accept people from every country, even if it means leaving out people with legitimate needs.

HS_ed: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
CN_ed: In the EU the governments can recognise as citizens people from other countries. The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.
HS_or: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
CN_or: In the EU the government recognises citizens from other countries, even if this does not mean that they can visit the UK. The fundamental rights of EU citizens are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries cannot be part of our country, unless we wish to exclude them.

HS_ed: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
CN_ed: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?
HS_or: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here
CN_or: They are not a burden, they just want to work. But our labour laws are so lenient that they can now work as they want.

HS_ed: Immigration is the root of all the problems. They just want to come here and replace us.
CN_ed: Immigration isn't a problem. I think most countries in the world are better off with the positive contribution of immigration.
HS_or: Immigration is the root of all the problems. They just want to come here and replace us.
CN_or: Immigration isn't a problem. I don't see any reason to restrict immigration. I think most countries in the world are better off without immigration.

HS_ed: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN_ed: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.
HS_or: They (migrants) come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands. They are not welcome here.
CN_or: In fact, refugees are often the happiest people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

HS_ed: Migrants are a burden to the UK.
CN_ed: Many migrants come here as willing people. Their skills complement our own. I doubt they'd be happy to know that they are considered 'a burden'.
HS_or: Migrants are a burden to the UK.
CN_or: Many migrants come here as young people. Their skills complement our own. I doubt they'd complain about being called 'foreigners'.

HS_ed: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
CN_ed: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.
HS_or: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK.
CN_or: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our population is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration a very positive thing for the UK.

HS_ed: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
CN_ed: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?
HS_or: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
CN_or: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK over the next ten years will be unskilled, temporary workers, and not permanent residents.

HS_ed: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
CN_ed: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?
HS_or: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK.
CN_or: I have heard that many Muslims in the UK are lazy and do not want to do the hard manual labour of house-building. But are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by people of a specific religion?

HS_ed: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN_ed: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our countr are legal citizens or have permission to stay. So immigration is not a problem for us.
HS_or: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN_or: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to the UK are UK citizens or have permission to stay. So immigration is not a problem for us.

HS_ed: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN_ed: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies, but the respect of human rights must be guaranteed.
HS_or: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN_or: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies.

HS_ed: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN_ed: The Middle East and Africa are countries that have suffered from centuries of colonialism, racism and war. The state of refugees in the UK is the result of these people seeking a peaceful place to live.
HS_or: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
